introduction: Every country seems to have its own version of dumplings! For audio and transcript downloads, plus a

vocabulary.definition: having the shape of a crescent or a thin, curved shape
vocabulary.example: The moon was a bright crescent in the night sky.

vocabulary.definition: to try different methods or ideas to discover what effect they have
vocabulary.example: The chef experimented with new spices in the recipe.

vocabulary.definition: a basic and important type of food that is regularly eaten
vocabulary.example: Rice is a staple food in many Asian countries.
The sponge was soaking up the spilled water on the counter.

vocabulary.definition: a sudden cry or remark expressing surprise, anger, or another emotion
vocabulary.example: She let out an exclamation of joy when she won the competition.

vocabulary.definition: food that provides a nostalgic or sentimental value and makes one feel comfortable or content
vocabulary.example: Macaroni and cheese is my ultimate comfort food.
